p.style: border: black 1px dotted; background-color: #EEEEEE; padding: 8px; margin-bottom: 8px

description.value: Codes to explain the current status of a treatment in a referral prescription.

p.style: border: black 1px dotted; background-color: #EEEEEE; padding: 8px; margin-bottom: 8px

div.p: Expansion based on SNOMED CT International edition 31-Jul 2022

description.value: Codes to define the high level category for a referral prescription. SNOMED-CT codes in this valueset are just a draft proposal to give a general idea - pending an official valueset.

p.style: border: black 1px dotted; background-color: #ffcccc; padding: 8px; margin-bottom: 8px

div.p: Expansion based on code system fragment BeCommunicationCode v1.0.0 (CodeSystem)

div.style: border: black 1px dotted; background-color: #EEEEEE; padding: 8px; margin-bottom: 8px

div.p: The value is a telephone number used for voice calls. Use of full international numbers starting with + is recommended to enable automatic dialing support but not required.
The value is a fax machine. Use of full international numbers starting with + is recommended to enable automatic dialing support but not required.
The value is an email address.
The value is a pager number. These may be local pager numbers that are only usable on a particular pager system.

A contact that is not a phone, fax, pager or email address and is expressed as a URL. This is intended for various institutional or personal contacts including web sites, blogs, Skype, Twitter, Facebook, etc. Do not use for email addresses.
A contact that can be used for sending an sms message (e.g. mobile phones, some landlines).

A contact that is not a phone, fax, page or email address and is not expressible as a URL. E.g. Internal mail address. This SHOULD NOT be used for contacts that are expressible as a URL (e.g. Skype, Twitter, Facebook, etc.) Extensions may be used to distinguish \u0022other\u0022 contact types.

description.value: Codes to define a communication method.

div.style: border: black 1px dotted; background-color: #EEEEEE; padding: 8px; margin-bottom: 8px

tr.td: This is a new proposal from a caregiver
This is a proposal based on an existing prescription

description.value: If the status of the request is proposal, this valueset indicates the different types of proposal

value.value: This is a new proposal from a caregiver
This is a proposal based on an existing prescription

p.style: border: black 1px dotted; background-color: #EEEEEE; padding: 8px; margin-bottom: 8px

div.p: The task is ready to be acted upon and action is sought.
The potential performer has agreed to execute the task but has not yet started work.
The potential performer who claimed ownership of the task has decided not to execute it prior to performing any action.

description.value: This is the status of the prescription for the coprescriber

p.style: border: black 1px dotted; background-color: #EEEEEE; padding: 8px; margin-bottom: 8px

div.p: The request represents a request/demand and authorization for action by a Practitioner.
The request is a suggestion made by someone/something that does not have an intention to ensure it occurs and without providing an authorization to act.

description.value: The allowed intent codes in the context of referral prescription

p.style: border: black 1px dotted; background-color: #EEEEEE; padding: 8px; margin-bottom: 8px

tr.td: The signature of the co-prescriber counts in the number of required signatures, but not blocking
The signature of the co-prescriber is recommended, but not blocking

description.value: This is the status reason of the prescription

description.value: Codes to define the use of contrast fluid.

p.style: border: black 1px dotted; background-color: #EEEEEE; padding: 8px; margin-bottom: 8px

div.p: **Definition:**The patient currently has a medical condition for which the vaccine is contraindicated or for which precaution is warranted.
**Definition:**There was no supply of the product on hand to perform the service.
**Definition:**The patient or their guardian objects to receiving the vaccine.
**Description:**The patient is believed to be allergic to a substance that is part of the therapy and the therapy is being temporarily withdrawn to confirm.
**Definition:**Therapy has been changed and new prescription issued

description.value: Codes to explain the current status of a referral prescription.
